name: Don't Kill Your Darlings
description:
The theme of LD50 is Delay The Inevitable 

In Don't Kill Your Darlings, you play as Dr. W, the woodland wizard veterinarian, looking to help geriatric critters live comfortably in their twilight years. Are you able to help these cutie-pies feel better and live comfortably before they glide gracefully toward the great PetsMart in the sky?

Press SPACE to advance the conversation

Click the drawers to heal.
